newsitem.title: USA: First Oak Brook pays increased dividend.
newsitem.headline: First Oak Brook pays increased dividend.

text.p: First Oak Brook Bancshares Inc, posting lower fourth-quarter and higher yearend earnings, said it paid an increased dividend Wednesday of $0.13 a share to holders of record as of January 10.
The previous dividend on its Class A common stock was $0.11 per share.
Earlier, the bank holding company posted quarterly earnings of 0.61 a share compared to $0.65 a share a year earlier. For all of 1996, it earned $2.06, up from $1.95 a share in 1995.
